sentence.Network_en: We decorated the seat of the bier awfully and solemnly.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们把灵寝装饰得庄严肃穆.

sentence.Network_en: And the bier was lifted once more, and they proceeded.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是担架又被抬了起来, 他们继续向前走去.

sentence.Network_en: He began to wail like a man at a bier.
sentence.Network_cn: 他像抚棺恸哭那样嚎啕起来.
